title: Menu
text:
How it works
Every pie is handmade with love, crafted with care, and baked using only high-quality Swiss ingredients. Each pie is about 24 cm in diameter and serves 6‚Äì10 people ‚Äî depending, of course, on how generous the slices are.
Orders can be picked up in Wallisellen, or delivery within the Z√ºrich area may be arranged. Because every pie and dessert is made from scratch ‚Äî from resting the dough to letting the filling set ‚Äî please allow at least 4 days‚Äô notice for your order.

title: What I Do
